name: Eggeny
description:
Eggeny is a game inspired by: slenderman, choochoo charles.

you come to a island to visit a friend, just to notice the island to be quite dead. with a few survivors and a broken boat you help to collect all eggs, help the people to get resources to escape. can you free the people and unravel the mystery?

NOTE 1: not everything is added that is planned

NOTE 2: Eggeny is ment to be a game made for fun, if this some how blows up. dont expect me to make it better. i cant, im bad at modeling and gui.
